content: this phone cozy is the second one i made for trying out different techniques in tunisian crochet it is quick and easy to make and also great starter piece in case you want to try something new the stitch pattern is a combination of tunisian simple stitch and ext tunisian front post double_crochet using two contrasting colours my sample is made for a iphone 14 pro but the size can be easily adapted to any mobile phone gauge is not crucial you also can use any other yarn you like the pattern is perfect for using up yarn left over from other projects the pattern is written in english and uses us crochet terms you can find basic explanations of tunisian crochet on my blog special stitches and changing colours are explained in the pattern don t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions
